As a political organization called Muscophiles (Russophile) in the 1870-1880's.?

Around an organization hurtuvavsya Ukrainian national movement in Nadnipryanskiy Ukraine in the first half of the 70s of the XIX century.?

answer.text: Southwest Branch of the Russian Geographical Society
